aiofauna.client package

Submodules

aiofauna.client.api_client module

This module provides utilities for creating HTTP clients using aiohttp and Pydantic.

class aiofauna.client.api_client.Client(*, base_url: str, headers: dict[str, str] = {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, limit: ConstrainedIntValue = 1000, timeout: ConstrainedIntValue = 10, connector_type: Literal['tcp', 'unix'] = 'tcp', **extra_data: Any)[source]

Bases: Document

Base Client that is subclassed to create a client for a specific API.

Features singleton pattern to ensure that only one instance of a client is created allowing session reuse for the same instance configuration.

Parameters:

  • base_url (str) – The base URL for the API.

  • headers (dict[str, str]) – The headers to use for the API.

  • limit (int) – The maximum number of connections to allow.

  • timeout (int) – The timeout for the API.

  • connector_type (Literal["tcp", "unix"]) – The type of connector to use.

Note

The connector and session fields are not included in the schema.

base_url: str

class aiofauna.client.api_client.SingletonModelMeta(name, bases, namespace, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: ModelMetaclass

Singleton metaclass for Pydantic models.

Monkey patches the Pydantic metaclass to ensure that only one instance of a model is created.

class aiofauna.client.fauna_client.FaunaClient(*, base_url: str = 'https://db.fauna.com', headers: dict[str, str] = None, limit: ConstrainedIntValue = 1000, timeout: ConstrainedIntValue = 10, connector_type: Literal['tcp', 'unix'] = 'tcp', **extra_data: Any)[source]

Bases: Client

FaunaDB Client

The main client for interacting with FaunaDB. This client is used to query the database and perform transactions on top of FQL <https://docs.fauna.com/fauna/current/api/fql/> language through a friendly pythonic interface.

param base_url:

Base URL for the client. Defaults to “https://db.fauna.com”.

type base_url:

str, optional

base_url

Base URL for the client.

Type:

str

headers

Headers for the client.

Type:

dict[str, str]

base_url: str
headers: dict[str, str]
async query(expr: Expr) → Any[source]

Query FaunaDB

param expr:

FaunaDB expression

type expr:

Expr

param A FaunaDB expression is a JSON object that represents a FaunaDB query. For more information on FaunaDB expressions:

param see the FQL documentation.:

param Basically an Expr is a Ref:

param SetRef or FaunaTime object:

param wrapping a JSON object that contains a FaunaDB query.:

returns:

The result of the query.

raises APIException:

API Exception

Example

from aiofauna import FaunaClient
from aiofauna.data import query

client = FaunaClient()

await client.query(q.create_database({"name": "my_database"}))
